title: Publication configuration file
description: Set of possible configuration options that define a publication.

theme.description: Theme of the publication. Can be either 'light' or 'dark'

languages.description: List of locales for the publication. First language should be te default locale with 'startUrl' of '/'.

code.description: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code which will be used for the path prefix, as a unique identifier

hrefLang.description: The IETF language tag for the <html lang='xx-XX' /> attribute. Also used for og tags

name.description: The english name of the locale

localName.description: The local name of the locale

dateFormat.description: The tokens that Moment.js accepts for date formatting. This can be used for dates on GraphQL queries

singleAuthorMode.description: This flag is responsible for defining if bibliography is article wide (dropdown) or publication wide (separate page).

description.description: Short description of the publication. For SEO reasons it's best for it to be at most 155-160 characters. Most social platforms cut off the description at 60-65 characters. This description should contain embeded keywords and be both targetted at humans and search engine robots.

author.description: Author of the publication. Will be displayed on the home page of the site.

caption.description: Text before the list of authors/editors of the publication. Can signify if it's editors or authors etc.

people.description: List out authors/editors of the publication

^(\\d+)$.description: Name of the section or 'false' in case section is unnamed. Enumeration starts with 1.
